file_content.text: Red patrol checking in. Still no enemy contact.
Green patrol. All clear in our neck of the woods.
Blue patrol. Quiet out here. A little too quiet. Could be--look out!
Open fire! Open fire! Watch the flank! Watch the--
Red patrol. We're pinned down. Walked into an ambush. Came at us from all sides.
Can't hold position much longer. Gonna have to make a break--ah! No! No!
Green patrol. Got a visual on the spaceport. No signs of life. We're going in.
Blaster fire! Get down! Get down!
